revised_title: Baron Rosenheim of Camden: A Pioneering Medical Scientist and Advocate
tldr: The article is a biographical memoir of Max Leonard Rosenheim, Baron Rosenheim of Camden, who was a distinguished clinician and medical scientist. He made significant contributions to medicine, particularly in persuading organized medicine to address contemporary issues. Rosenheim held various positions in the Royal Society and was instrumental in expanding the activities and influence of the Royal College of Physicians.
scientific_discipline: Medicine and Health Sciences > Medical History
